summary: This bill, the Expanding Partnerships for Innovation and Competitiveness Act, mandates the establishment of the Foundation for Standards and Metrology. The Foundation, a non-profit corporation, will support the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in advancing measurement science, technical standards, and technology. It will foster collaboration with various entities to accelerate technological development, commercialization, and international engagement. The Foundation will be governed by a board of directors and can receive and administer funds. The bill also outlines reporting, auditing, and other administrative requirements.
